<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

 <ServerId>1</ServerId>

 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>

 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>

</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="4" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2017-08-07 14:47:06" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="4" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2017-08-28 00:57:38" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION" value="4" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION_UPDATE" value="2017-08-28 16:51:05" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
[ServerSettings] ShowMapPlayerLocation=![ShowMapPlayerLocation] GlobalVoiceChat=![GlobalVoiceChat] ProximityChat=![ProximityChat] NoTributeDownloads=![NoTributeDownloads] AllowThirdPersonPlayer=![AllowThirdPersonPlayer] AlwaysNotifyPlayerLeft=![AlwaysNotifyPlayerLeft] DontAlwaysNotifyPlayerJoined=![DontAlwaysNotifyPlayerJoined] ServerHardcore=![ServerHardcore] ServerPVE=![ServerPVE] ServerForceNoHUD=![ServerForceNoHUD] EnablePvPGamma=![EnablePvPGamma] ServerPassword=$[PrivatePassword] ServerAdminPassword=$[RConPassword] RCONPort=$[Service.RConPort] AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier=![AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier] PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier=![PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier] KickIdlePlayersPeriod=![KickIdlePlayersPeriod] PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier=![PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier] AutoSavePeriodMinutes=![AutoSavePeriodMinutes] ListenServerTetherDistanceMultiplier=![ListenServerTetherDistanceMultiplier] MaxTamedDinos=![MaxTamedDinos] RCONServerGameLogBuffer=![RCONServerGameLogBuffer] AllowFlyerCarryPvE=![AllowFlyerCarryPvE] DisableStructureDecayPvE=![DisableStructureDecayPvE]
[/Script/DNL.ShooterGameUserSettings] MasterAudioVolume=1.000000 MusicAudioVolume=1.000000 SFXAudioVolume=1.000000 VoiceAudioVolume=1.000000 UIScaling=1.000000 CameraShakeScale=1.000000 bFirstPersonRiding=False bDoubleClickToEvade=True bShowStatusNotificationMessages=True TrueSkyQuality=0.700000 FOVMultiplier=1.000000 GroundClutterDensity=1.000000 bFilmGrain=False bAllowHDR=False bMotionBlur=False bUseDFAO=False bUseSSAO=True bShowChatBox=True bCameraViewBob=True bInvertLookY=False bFloatingNames=True bChatBubbles=True bHideServerInfo=False bJoinNotifications=False bCraftablesShowAllItems=True bLocalInventoryShowAllItems=False bRemoteInventoryShowAllItems=False LookLeftRightSensitivity=1.000000 LookUpDownSensitivity=1.000000 GraphicsQuality=1 ActiveLingeringWorldTiles=10 ClientNetQuality=3 LastServerSearchType=0 LastServerSearchHideFull=False LastServerSearchProtected=False HideItemTextOverlay=False bDistanceFieldShadowing=True LODScalar=1.000000 bToggleToTalk=False HighQualityMaterials=True HighQualitySurfaces=True bTemperatureF=False bDisableTorporEffect=False bChatShowSteamName=False bChatShowTribeName=True EmoteKeyBind1=0 EmoteKeyBind2=0 EmoteKeyBindLaughing=0 EmoteKeyBindSorry=0 bNoBloodEffects=False bLowQualityVFX=False bSpectatorManualFloatingNames=False bSuppressAdminIcon=False bUseSimpleDistanceMovement=False bDisableMeleeCameraSwingAnims=False LastPVESearchType=-1 LastDLCTypeSearchType=-1 bUseVSync=False MacroCtrl0= MacroCtrl1= MacroCtrl2= MacroCtrl3= MacroCtrl4= MacroCtrl5= MacroCtrl6= MacroCtrl7= MacroCtrl8= MacroCtrl9= ResolutionSizeX=1280 ResolutionSizeY=720 LastUserConfirmedResolutionSizeX=1280 LastUserConfirmedResolutionSizeY=720 WindowPosX=-1 WindowPosY=-1 bUseDesktopResolutionForFullscreen=False LastConfirmedFullscreenMode=0 Version=5
[SessionSettings] SessionName=$[HostName]
[ScalabilityGroups] sg.ResolutionQuality=100 sg.ViewDistanceQuality=3 sg.AntiAliasingQuality=3 sg.ShadowQuality=3 sg.PostProcessQuality=3 sg.TextureQuality=3 sg.EffectsQuality=3 sg.TrueSkyQuality=3 sg.GroundClutterQuality=3 sg.IBLQuality=1 sg.HeightFieldShadowQuality=3
[/Game/DNL/BaseResource/BaseBP/TestGameMode.TestGameMode_C] IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount=15.000000
[/Script/Engine.GameSession] MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots]
